description: List GMS items that have been removed from TK Campaign by seller

parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID assigned by Open API platform is required. Required for all requests.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: UNIX timestamp, accurate to the second. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The token for API calls. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Signature authentication example: all request parameters sorted by name concatenated...

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Specifies the starting point, or the number of records to skip. Default is 0

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Specifies the maximum number of records to return. Default is 50. Maximum is 500

parameters.name: error
parameters.description: Indicate error type if no error. Empty if no error happened

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: Indicate error details if no error. Empty if no error happened

parameters.name: warning
parameters.description: Indicate warning details if not warning. Empty if no warning happened

parameters.name: request_id
parameters.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking

parameters.name: has_next_page
parameters.description: Indicate that there are more item IDs
